1: <pb/>An Oseas in tic, yunnal in Beeri, 'ix paxtin Jehová 'ayin, yic xya'n ewin tic reyl 'a chon̈b' Judá: Atn Uzías, Jotam, Acaz, yet' Ezequías, ax Jeroboam yunnal Joás, a 'aych reyl 'a chon̈b' Israel.
2: <pb/>'Ix schan 'eln̈ej Jehová yich spaxtin 'ayin, xyaln 'ixtic: 'A eb' et israelal tic, 'ix ya'ch eb' smul 'a wojltac, xyi'n 'el sb'a eb' 'ayin, in yactn can eb' 'icha junc 'ix 'ajmul 'ix. Yuj cha, 'ij junc 'ix 'ajmul 'ix estziloc, ax yalj yune 'ix 'a scal yajmulal cha, xchi.
3: <pb/>Yuj cha, xwi'n in b'a yet' jun 'ix 'ix tzcuch Gomer, yisl jun win Diblaim sb'i. Xlajw cha, scuchn chan̈ 'ix yune', 'ix 'alj jun swinc 'unn 'ix.
4: 'Ix yaln Jehová 'ayn 'ixtic: Jezreel tzac' sb'ic win 'unn tic, yujto yic wal jaye c'u, ax wa'n 'och yailal 'a yib'n̈ eb' yin̈tl win rey Jehú, yujto til wal 'anma smil cham 'a chon̈b' Jezreel,<f>[1]</f> an̈jtona', 'oj wac' lajwc chon̈b' Israel.
5: A 'a jun c'u cha, 'oj in satl eb' soldado yic chon̈b' Israel 'a lum span̈nil Jezreel, xchi Dios 'ayin.
6: <pb/>Scuchn pax chan̈ 'ix Gomer chi junx yune', x'alj junx yune 'ix cha, 'ix 'unin. 'Ix yaln pax Dios 'ayin: Man̈ Chamc'ojlb'iloc,<f>[2]</f> 'ixta tzac' sb'ic 'ix 'unn tic, yujto man̈x 'oj 'o'ch in c'ojl 'a yib'n̈ chon̈b' Israel, man̈x 'oj wac' niwnc'ojlal 'a 'a.
7: Palta ax chon̈b' Judá, 'oj 'o'ch in c'ojl 'a 'a. An Jehová in tic, sDiosal in jun chon̈b' cha, an 'oj in colo', man̈oc yet' owl 'oj in colo', man̈oc yet' jul-lab', man̈oc yet' q'uen espada, man̈oc pax yet' eb' soldado 'ay q'ue 'a yib'n̈ chej, palta a yet' in poder 'oj in col eb', xchi Dios cha.
8: <pb/>Ax 'a yic tox 'ix 'el 'ix 'unn chi 'a yim, 'ix scuchn pax chan̈ 'ix Gomer chi yune jun 'ejm xo, x'alj pax junx swinc 'unn 'ix.
9: 'Ix yaln pax Jehová 'ixtc 'ayin: Man̈ in Chon̈b'oc,<f>[3]</f> 'ixta tzac' sb'ic win 'unn tic, yujto a eb' israel tic, man̈x in chon̈b'oc yaj eb', man̈x in sDiosalc eb'.
10: <pb/><t>Palta 'ay jun c'ual, 'oj niwtjoc pax sb'isl eb' israel tic, lajn 'oj 'aj eb' 'icha yarenail sti a mar, man̈x 'a mach 'oj stac' sb'isni. A yic cob' tzwaln 'a eb' 'ixtic: Man̈ ex in chon̈b'oc, xin chi 'a eb'; a pax ta 'oj alxoc 'ixtc yuj eb': A eb' 'anma tic, caw yel yunnal jun Dios pitzn eb', 'oj schioc.</t>
11: <t>'Oj lajwc cha, ax syamn sb'a smasnil eb' 'aj Judá, yet' eb' 'aj Israel, junxn̈ej syajlil eb' 'oj ya'chi. Junxn̈ej 'oj 'aj sjapx eb' wul yi'x slum jun 'ejm xo. ¡Caw niwn yel'ch jun c'u yic Jezreel!</t>
